sources.title: Man's Favorite Sport (1964) Rock Hudson Â· Paula Prentiss
sources.description: Roger Willoughby works at a sporting goods store and is the author of a best selling guide to fishing, even though he has never fished. However Abby inveigles him to enter a fishing tournament.

metadata.Plot: Roger Willoughby is considered to be a leading expert on sports fishing. He's written books on the subject and is loved by his customers in the sporting goods department at Abercrombie and Fitch, where he works. There's only one problem however: he's never been fishing in his life. When the store owner enters him in a fishing contest, mayhem ensues.
metadata.Writer: Pat Frank, John Fenton Murray, Steve McNeil
metadata.Actors: Rock Hudson, Paula Prentiss, Maria Perschy
